website_summaries.verdict: A clever design that doubles as both car seat and soft-sided carrier, but its flimsy construction is a deal-breaker for some.
pros: Owners like the double-use convenience as both an open-top car seat and a closed-top carrier
Side storage pockets are a nice plus
cons: Tether strap too short for dogs to comfortably lie down when hooked in
Owners want more padding and reinforcement of the bottom panel
Reports of tether clip breaking after a few uses, and handle fraying at attachment points

customer_reviews.title: Love it. My dog fit in nice and snug
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My dog fit in nice and snug. I plan on putting something in the bottom to make it more comfy. I am more secure knowing he won't be moving around.
customer_reviews.author: grb611

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cat to ride up front with me. I put him in a harness and we drove 1800 miles with no issues. I loved it because I could adjust the length of the strap inside and leave the top open for him to enjoy sitting up without being trapped for all that time. There are two straps on the back perfect for pitting the seatbelt through. Best system I've seen and my three dogs and two cats have seen 5 countries and 40 states so I know about traveling with pets!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Best carrier/Seat
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this carrier/car seat for my mini hot dog . She is 10 pounds fully grown and there is enough room for two of her. It is collapsible and has a carrying pouch to store. Lots of pockets and it also has a leash/lead inside so she cannot get out but she can lay comfortable. I put her favorite Blanky inside and after awhile she layed down and went to sleep. I am happy and so is my furbaby!!! Now she can travel with me everywhere and I don't have to worry about her being uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: kiki

customer_reviews.title: she is very happy sitting in this for long car rides
customer_reviews.text: My dog finally stays in the seat where she belongs! Even without the strap being attached to her harness, she is very happy sitting in this for long car rides. The only issue so far is that the bottom needs a little bit of reinforement for heavier dogs (she's around 13 lbs.)
customer_reviews.author: JenS

customer_reviews.title: My dog fit in nice!! And I happy knowing that he is ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog fit in nice!! And I happy knowing that he is secure and comfy in this stylish carrier. The pockets are great for carrying all his treats, bags, leash, etc. The straps and zippers all feel durable. The two straps in the back make it easy to secure the carrier to the car using a seatbelt.
customer_reviews.author: Claribel Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Great for tiny dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I saw some reviews were bad on this product. Nevertheless, I purchased this for my two pound Maltipoo. My husband looked at the photos to see how to install it safely. I put a larger blanket and toys in it. I use the lead clip inside and clip it on her collar. So, she is zipped in and secure like a car seat. Being able to completely zip/close her in it what makes this product special. If you don't want your pup eating the car seat, put toys in it. If your dog is bigger I would recommend something with solid/hard sides.
customer_reviews.author: T-Rex

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my grand-pup! She's getting use to it but I love it. It has a place for her lease should be hooked so she can't get out and it adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Denise H Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for our 13 pound cavachon
customer_reviews.text: This is the most relaxed our dog has ever been in the car. He felt secure and content. Perfect size for our 13 pound cavachon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrier. I use it for my cats when we go to the vet. They do much better having the top open when going for a car ride. My one cat usually pukes and the other cat pees in our old closed carrier. When we used the open carrier we did not have any accidents. It is nice that there is a latch to keep them in the carrier. I use a little vest on the cat and connect it to the carrier. I purchased a cheaper one before this and returned it because it was flimsy when carrying the cat. Spending the extra money was well worth it. I highly recommend this carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Kgali

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had this on our cross country trip!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this. Sturdy and well constructed. We strung the straps through the head rest posts between the seats of our pickup and it gives our chunky chihuahua a cozy & safe place to curl up. The pouches on the sides are perfect for storing doggie wipes, treats and baggies. We did put a little pillow in it and got some pipe insulation to cushion the zippered top edge so he can lay his chin on it and look over the top. He took to it right away. And now I don’t have a doggy on my lap the whole trip. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Connie S.

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend at all!
customer_reviews.text: Seam's didn't split, they where never sewn in the first place. When I actually needed to use it to carry small dog to vet, the rest of the seam split, nearly dumping dog onto pavement. Do not recommend at all,I wish I had noticed poor quality sooner & returned!
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Swisher

customer_reviews.title: I like it. But the side carrying straps makes me question the product!
customer_reviews.text: I actually like to car seat for my 13 pound pup. The only issue is the straps are already beginning to shred. Sad for me because I want to give it a 5 star otherwise. It keeps her secured in the seat and she is small enough to make a nap curled up of course. I wish I could reach out to the company and let them know about the defaulted straps on on the sides. Not the strap that secures to your headrest. I’ve only as the seat about 6 weeks and only used the seat about a dozen times. Just so you have an idea about wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy's Wife

customer_reviews.title: Well designed carrier
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the car for my cat. He likes to sit and look out and is slowly getting comfortable enough to take a nap in the carrier while travelling. I like the design that provides ample room for a blanket and the cat, excellent ventilation, pockets where I can stash harness, food, leash, and water, and quick access to the pet. For me it is too large and bulky to carry (I have a smaller carrier for airplanes and vet) any distance but it is perfect in the car. It is well designed, sturdy and apparently comfortable...according to the cat.
customer_reviews.author: Apple

customer_reviews.title: Great Cat Carrier!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this soft carry case! I added a soft cushion, also ordered from Amazon, and he is quite comfortable when we travel. The seatbelt slides through the back to hold it in place and there is a pocket to hold a can of cat food. It also collapses flat for storage. I got one for a friend and her cat sleeps in it all the time at home. The only reason I gave it four stars for sturdiness is because the front caved in a little bit after lots of use. Other than that I am pleased as punch with this cat carrier!
customer_reviews.author: Bird's Nest

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice carseat.
customer_reviews.text: The dog can sit, or lay out of any drafts. She's a puppy and she made it 11 hours,with some potty and water stops. We tried it out around town first so she was used to it, put a blanket in it to make it cozy. We re-rigged the middle seat belt in the car so it could be used in the straps on the back of the puppy car seat. The tether clasp should be better quality i.e., easier to use, so I re-igged it as well. She was safe and could see us in front as well as get water from a bottle. We were well satisfied with this purchase !
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: Product appeared to be well built, we have a small miniature poodle and she wanted to get out and found away, that resulted in her hanging by the restraining straps in the back seat. She had a harness on that she was hanging from so she was safe. Liked the concept just might need to be a smaller size for smaller hyper dogs with a little better restrain design.
customer_reviews.author: huges30

customer_reviews.title: Really great product that is light weight and folds flat for ...
customer_reviews.text: Really great product that is light weight and folds flat for storage. Inside dog leash is great add and the straps to hold in with seatbelt in car too! Only thing i wish was different was the velco strap that holds the top mesh open shiuld have been sewn on the exterior of the back instead of the interior where my dog chews on the velcro when the top is closed because the 4” strip hangs down in the carrier over the dogs head.
customer_reviews.author: C Roberts

customer_reviews.title: This would be an awesome product if the quality of the materials were better
customer_reviews.text: I had really high hopes for this product. I bought it before I even got my new puppy. I've use this less than 10 times and one of the straps has already broken and the zipper has fallen apart.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora's Box

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Teacup Sized Dog ONLY
customer_reviews.text: So I have a love/hate feeling about this carrier. It's great quality, sturdy, and practical. Everything I was looking for. Except.....there is no way for a dog to fit comfortably in this. Just no way. Sure you can cram a 20 lbs dog in it, but I promise you he won't be able to move. My 6 lbs french bulldog barely fits. So I ended up returning it because he'll outgrow this in a couple of week. Only buy if you have a teacup sized dog. Don't let the description fool you.
customer_reviews.author: Tine R.

customer_reviews.title: I have bought 3 of these and they are great
customer_reviews.text: I bought one small and two large. One small and one large went to my daughter. Her pup is getting a lot of use out of them. They are easy to carry and easy to put in the car. Her pup settles down and sleeps when she is put in hers. My pup on the other hand chewed the zipper out of hers. They are made very well, but my pup is a chewer. After it would no longer zip it became a very large chew toy. I was grateful for that because it has saved my furniture. I have been happy with these purchases.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Great size and features, but flimsy bottom
customer_reviews.text: It's very spacious for my cat, which is nice. It also has good size Windows and pockets. It's awkward to carry bc the bottom is not rigid, so it buckles when my cat is in it. She's 10 lbs, so she's not hefty, it's just poor design. To fix this, I cut out a piece of plywood, the shape/size of the bottom, covered it in a towel, and put in there. Now the bottom doesn't/can't buckle while carrying it.
customer_reviews.author: T. M

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Like to keep something in our vehicles for my 6 lb yorkie poo to be comfortable in. We take him with us whenever we go somewhere by car or truck. Bought this one so we didn’t have to keep moving another small dog vehicle crate from the truck to the car, so got this one to keep in the car. My little one got right in it and went to sleep. It is smaller than the one we keep in the truck but he seems to like this one even more than the larger one. Thinking of ordering a second one because he likes it so much.
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: Car Sear Carrier
customer_reviews.text: It works okay for a car seat and carrier. The tether inside the carrier would work better if it was an inch or so longer to allow more range of motion for the pet. For carrier purposes, it is a little bulky. Overall, it serves it's purpose and I use it every time I transport my precious Yorkie.
customer_reviews.author: Janell Janell

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Order
customer_reviews.text: Three dogs and a car seat for each one. Never zip the top so they can watch out the window. Wish the leads on the larger sizes were about 2" longer. Overall an excellent product. Must be, I have ordered them three times
customer_reviews.author: Long Beach Lady

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to set up in my Subaru
customer_reviews.text: The pet carrier arrived promptly as promised. It was easy to set up in my Subaru, fit my puppy, and everything was great until my three month old shih tzu mix chewed through the harness hook strap. The material surely wasn't designed to hold up to a puppy who doesn't even have adult teeth and could accomplish destroying the strap in less than 20 minutes on the way home from work! I am very disappointed. It was an expensive purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: I don't think we could love this any more than we do
customer_reviews.text: I don't think we could love this any more than we do. Our 9 pound pomeranian sits in here just fine. He can lay down too. He kind of lays on the front part, but with him clipped in and the sides still up he's totally protected. I'm very happy we have him riding in safety!
customer_reviews.author: bounce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Boston terrier
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it! I have a Boston Terrier and the large is perfect for her. I did buy a towel to put in the bottom of it as it has a slick bottom. She will lay down and go right to sleep in it. Tip: If you have shoulder straps, you may need to buy a seat belt holder. I ended up buying a luggage strap to wrap around the seat. Holds it steady perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Car “seat” for our fur baby
customer_reviews.text: Nice height, width & depth for our small dogs. Our Maltese is about 6lbs and our new havanese is nearly 7lbs and they both fit well (separately- not both at the same time) with decent extra room. The sides are sturdy and it provides security to allow them to feel at ease in the car. The zipper top closure is a nice feature if in the car alone and you want to insure their safety while you drive. It is also a nice carrier. Would buy again & recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliantly designed
customer_reviews.text: Great as a car or airplane carrier and can even work as a kennel substitute. Netting on upper halves of sides and top (which can be open or zipped closed) is important feature. Pockets are useful. Collapsible w/carrying case. Well built and secure when installed.
customer_reviews.author: Dena K

customer_reviews.title: NOT for dogs over 12#
customer_reviews.text: Great concept and the product seems well-made. Now the BUT......the problem is I ordered a carrier/seat for a dog up to 20#. In the photo, my puppy was on the way to the vet. He weighed 10.8 lbs. The strap that was holding him in the carrier was at its maximum length. Even if the strap were longer, I can't imagine putting a puppy over 12# in here.
customer_reviews.author: GolferGirlTN

customer_reviews.title: So easy and light- versatile
customer_reviews.text: So easy and light- versatile. Seems very well made. I like that I can fold it up easy. I bought one for my daughter's cat at Christmas and he won't let her put it away, he keeps dragging it into the room.
customer_reviews.author: Deb  A

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this bag
customer_reviews.text: Took my 4 month old pup on his first long road trip. I really liked this bag. It's sturdy and roomy. Only complaint I would have is I wished it was more padded on the bottom. I had to put down a small pad I had to make it more comfortable for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Bouncy96

customer_reviews.title: Safe and easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves her car carrier. It appears comfortable and she almost instantly settles down and falls asleep. I feel good knowing she is safe. I’ve mostly used it around town so a real test will be a six hour drive coming up soon. I usually keep a couple of small chew toys in the carrier with her and she is happy.
customer_reviews.author: treebean

customer_reviews.title: Very small, but strong!
customer_reviews.text: Strong and durable carrier, love that it collapses. However it is very small. My poor 9lb cat barely fits and can’t stand up which seems uncomfortable. Better for teenier creatures perhaps! Also, the zippers don’t have a locking feature so she was able to escape once!
customer_reviews.author: Batcee

customer_reviews.title: I love how it folds apart
customer_reviews.text: I love how it folds apart, and has the seat belt strap loops. As other said, it could have been a couple inches taller. The straps that go over the head rest is very cheap. Makes me think of how much force it could take in a sudden stop. I will replace it with laptop strap from a better bag, or a rifle bag strap. I like the pockets on the side to hold her leash, and water bowl.
customer_reviews.author: The Dog Father

customer_reviews.title: Safe puppy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my Shih-Poo as a car seat. I love that it belts to the car seatbelt and has the inner latch to attach to his harness. I feel that he is safe while we are driving. It is spacious and somewhat deep, so it provides a nice little “nest” for him. I would not use it as a carrier with any regularity. It seems a bit cumbersome for that, but may work well for other types of travel. I love it as a car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Penny D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: First put my cat in. It was easy to zip and seemed to be good. Then I tried to pick up the carrier - big fail. I thought I'd try my 10 pound dog. Another big fail. The bottom is just not sturdy, I was afraid it would break. The handles are put in strange places which also contributes to the instability. I wanted this to work and am disappointed. I plan to return it.
customer_reviews.author: ShearstoreAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice pet seat booster!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! very similar to a Pet Gear booster seat that I bought years ago (and still use for another fur baby) this easy install, size is perfect for a 12 lb Westi/Maltese mix. has plenty of pockets and also a clip to attached her collar/harness too. would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bentleys Mom

customer_reviews.title: 6# puppy chewed his way out on 2nd ride
customer_reviews.text: So dissapointed. My 6# puppy was able to chew his way out on the second car ride (only 30 minutes long) despite having a chew in there with him. So bummed. And, I didn't use it until after the 30 day mark so no way to exchange or return. What a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this carrier. So does my puppy - a 5 lb shih-poo. I just put a little dog blanket and a toy in there for her and she's happy. I have only used it in the car so far, but I can see this working well on a plane, too. It’s very sturdy and lightweight. I love how the top opens and you can easily set the dog inside.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Meekins

customer_reviews.title: Everything has been thought out.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with this order. I haven’t had a chance to use it in the car yet but it went together super fast. It’s well constructed and lots of pockets for holding necessary items. And the leash on the inside will be very helpful for keeping my little doggie safe in his carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Small Pets
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pet carrier for a friend. She has thoroughly enjoyed using it and says the quality is first rate. The size is just right for her small dog. This is the perfect solution to keep pets out of your lap when driving. Safety and protection are no longer a concern.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: She says it was easy to install and that the dogs both fit
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mothers 2 little dogs. She says it was easy to install and that the dogs both fit. She said they like being able to sit up and watch what is going on without falling all over the car as she is driving :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Doggie Car seat
customer_reviews.text: I love almost everything about this. The only thing I would change or improve would be to add a better pad on the base of it that is easy to clean and wipe down. and to make the clip for securing the pet easier and a little larger. It's so hard to do one handed. And it's not getting better with use
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: My cats wouldn't stay in them while I was driving....one under the passenger seat and the other most often somewhere he could touch me. However, these were great for transporting the kitties from hotel to car and back again. I'm glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: Head rest strap quality issue
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today. While it seems fairly sturdy, and is a perfect size for my 5lb chihuahua, the strap I received is much too short to go around the head rest. I'm very disappointed as I made the purchase based on the fact that it is supposed to attach to the car seat in 2 ways. So buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: K Fitz

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, my dog does not. I have a 13 lbs Papillon Mix, he has very long legs, large chest. He tries hard to climb out of it, and I don't really trust the clip inside (material seems weak) to hold him in, so i close the mesh cover, but he looks so sad when i do that. Because if his long legs, I also have to shove him in quite a bit in order to close it. Probably better for short stubby dogs, like shih tzus or something.
customer_reviews.author: Mareike S.K.

customer_reviews.title: It’s actually quite hard to secure my dog in mmmm
customer_reviews.text: It’s actually quite hard to secure my dog in this carrier although he fits perfectly in it particularly since I have a small car. I have finagled my own way to secure it with the seatbelts of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Smarti

customer_reviews.title: Too low.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, but wish it were taller. I have a tiny chihuahua, 5lbs, and her head hits the top when zipped, no real headroom. Great for travel, but only if they lay down. I bought the large.
customer_reviews.author: JustMe

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase but has vehicle seatbelt issue.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5 lb. Chihuahua and I bought the larger size so she'd have space to spread out and be able to put her blanket in with her. However, I didn't see any way to use a seat belt with it. So I used the strap for carrying it by putting it around the headrest. I also attached another heavier strap with it. My reasons for purchasing this is because I needed something safe for her to be in for a road trip that I'm planning. Other than the seatbelt issue I think it's a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Horrible and Weak!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible!! My puppy was able to chew and know her way out of this. The netting is too weak!! She scared me while I was driving by suddenly being loose!! This was during transport being her home. Don’t buy unless you have an already well trained dog!!
customer_reviews.author: mrsmomyogadoc

customer_reviews.title: Pet loves it.
customer_reviews.text: 14 pound toy Aussie loves it. She likes to get in it as she knows she gets to go somewhere. I fell like she is much safe in it than on a leash or carried in our arms.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Size Small perfect for Shih Poo
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, lots of room for a shih-poo puppy. We feel confident this will still be a lot of room for puppy to standup and turn around in when he gets to be an adult. Super functional as a carry bag and easy to hook onto the seat of a car.
customer_reviews.author: CarolineB

customer_reviews.title: Good news for Goodwill
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a different carrier for my dog and when it came, it did not meet expectations! It kept collapsing inward as there were no supports for keeping the base open. Good news for Goodwill! I then ordered this one and it is perfect. My 20 lb dog fits perfectly in it. It stays open and she is comfortable and safe! I love it and so does she!
customer_reviews.author: Nancykav

customer_reviews.title: Nice car carrier
customer_reviews.text: Keeps him from crawling into my lap while driving. He's 12# and can't stand up in this without pushing against the top. I love all the zippers, easy to clean should he ralph.
customer_reviews.author: K. E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: He do sit in it while I'm driving in the car but the straps not sturdy at all
customer_reviews.text: I brought this in January and use it only 3 times to take my dog to his vets appointments and the strap broke while he was inside, He do sit in it while I'm driving in the car but the straps not sturdy at all,
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Very much pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very much pleased with my purchase. I have two small dogs and now they can see out now when we are going somewhere. The built-in Lish restraint is great, it stopped them from jumping out. We are much happier now, thank you for the cute seat for the dogs to safely travel with us. C. Johnson
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great car carrier for your pet
customer_reviews.text: Great car carrier for your pet. I opted for the large and our dachshund fits great with a lot of room for her to move and be comfortable. I like the option with the zoo closure so we can also carry her on my shoulder. The carrier was able to fit between 2 car seats with out a problem. This has really saved our road trips with our dog and children. I feel this carrier provides great protection.
customer_reviews.author: KCMcMillan

customer_reviews.title: The dog car set is wonderful, and it goes with my black leather interior
customer_reviews.text: The dog car set is wonderful, and it goes with my black leather interior.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Feel good knowing your pet is secure
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is for our miniature poodle. Because he is missing a leg, it's important that he feels safe and comfortable in the car. It has worked out great for long trips, we have a different seat in the car we use for around town. Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: My puppy was too BIG for this! She is 20 lb but I thought it would work. Great structure, and the color is terrific. Wish she was a smaller dog!
customer_reviews.author: Sassygirlkp

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy at all
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 lb morkie. This collapses in the front just from her front feet. The sides are a little sturdier but does not keep her in the carrier at all.
customer_reviews.author: vicki stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great for long distant travel
customer_reviews.text: Our little Dachshund has IVDD, she’s had multiple procedures to be able to walk again, So it is very important to keep her safe and secure in the car. Minnie is a curious dog and loves to see what’s going on around her. This Car seat is perfect for her (we’ve tried multiple products, this is the best one) the top is a little flimsy, so I recommend getting a bigger size than the small so your small dog has more room and won’t feel the need to stick there paws on top and smash it down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product, with the exception of the horrible, burnt/metallic/plastic smell (This is the only way to describe it). I tried airing it out, but there was no change. I don’t want my pet near it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn R.

customer_reviews.title: Good enoug for Prozac
customer_reviews.text: We got the large size for our 17 pound dachshund, Prozac. He fits into it very well and actually seems to enjoy it. I put it on the floor when we 1st got it and he climbed right inside and curled up.
customer_reviews.author: John Bitna

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this car carrier for my fur baby. It allows her to see out as well as us to see in and protects her from falling or getting injured while riding in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Sgenz

customer_reviews.title: A plastic carrier will work fine for the car
customer_reviews.text: Awful. On first use my dog hopped right out the side and was left hanging even after being secured with a proper harness and adjusting the strap inside. Also ripped the strap halfway. Tried to close dog inside (mind you an 8lb Pomeranian), and broke open the zipper by essentially jumping through it. Wrote to have it refunded and was inconvenienced by having to use my printer ink and paper to print the return label, drive to the UPS store to drop it off, and pay three dollars to have it repackaged since I hadn't saved the original one. Save yourself the headache and don't buy this. A plastic carrier will work fine for the car.
customer_reviews.author: ITZMmme

customer_reviews.title: Pet car seat
customer_reviews.text: I really like this car seat, it’s easy to strap in and it well made . I will it have padding in the bottom of it , then it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: M queen

customer_reviews.title: It's a great bag for very small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Great size for my 4lb yorkie. I had to spray it with fabric freshener and let it sit for awhile as it had an unpleasant odor at first. It's gone now and my fur baby sleeps in it even around the house. A pet pillow will go a long way, as the bottom is not soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jilaine Lomas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 10 pound dog
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy I believe. Perfect for my 10 pound dog. He seems to really like it as well and was comfortable. Very easy to get in the car and perfect for long trips. It didn’t move around on the ride or with my dog wiggling in it.
customer_reviews.author: grace

customer_reviews.title: Rocky and his ride to the park!
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat. It's just what I needed. Though the clasp that hangs on to him isn't very large, it does a helluva job hanging onto him. He is Rocky, he is 13lbs - a rescue - a maltese/cairn terrier mix. He does his best to get out but the seat works wonderfully. I imagine it's just a matter of time till he relates going to the park with his seat. It's sturdy and well made. Perfect for my little one.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: loves being able to see around her and we like the fact she is protected
customer_reviews.text: Our Shih Tzu fits well, loves being able to see around her and we like the fact she is protected. Storage space is minimal as it folds flat. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Szabo

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful car seat for our Dog
customer_reviews.text: This is well made and durable. Our little maltese, Lily loves it. It has enough room for her and lots of pockets to store items in for her. It also folds up nicely when you are not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessicapic

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It goes from flat to constructed by zipping it into the shape you see. Its a simple design and really practical. It is also very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M.

customer_reviews.title: Great dog car seat for a dog up to about ...
customer_reviews.text: Great dog car seat for a dog up to about 20 pounds. Our puppy is 18 pounds and she will probably be too big for it soon but it has been great for her small wiggly puppy stages of life. It straps in well to the seat belt and has a strap to keep the dog in it while you drive.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: front end too soft, collapse when puppy lean on it
customer_reviews.author: amzshopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product is EXACTLY like picture and exactly as described. I love having a car seat for both of my babies and they love them too. If we bring them inside they’ll often go lay in them rather than a bed. When I broke the last one after 3 years of use I had to buy 2 more. They install very easily and were delivered super quickly. Can’t wait to take the babies out this weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Minton

customer_reviews.title: Seemed sturdy but...
customer_reviews.text: My dog is only 7 lbs but is tall so the inside tether is too short for her to sit up like the dog in the picture is doing and put her front legs out the top front and collapsed it. The front would never stay upright again. I paid way too much for this ($41.99) back in 2107 and was unable to return it. I really don't understand all the high ratings.
customer_reviews.author: S Hill

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The internal clip to attach to your dogs harness is way too small and hard to open apart to attach the collar or harness to. I’m not sure my dog will sit still for 3 minutes while I try to get her safe. I probably wont be able to use it. With the COVID-19, I’m not going anywhere in the next month or so...😢
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Dee

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: Good product I could see if I had a larger dog it would rip though. I have a 3 lb chi hes tiny I got the large one and he likes it in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Rbol

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this car seat! My little babe is 22lb so I was a bit nervous on my purchase.. but he fits perfectly fine. And we’re working on my pup to be more active a lose a couple lbs! Lol it is a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Veeg

customer_reviews.title: Safe ride
customer_reviews.text: This seat provides a safe and comfortable ride for my pup. It is very easy to disconnect to carry pup into the vet.
customer_reviews.author: Michele A Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Made a nervous dog comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a cross-country roadtrip with my dog. He’s a pretty nervous dude and has never been comfortable in the car, but this is great. He’s a mutt and kind of an awkward size, so I’m not sure I could use this with the top closed, but I put his blanket and some toys in this and he just naps. He’s so content, it’s honestly shocking. The strap to hook onto the dog doesn’t adjust to a comfortable length for my dog, and after a few days the hook popped off the strap. Otherwise, I’m so grateful I got this carrier for our trip
customer_reviews.author: Emily Gima

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Easy to put together, no instructions needed. I got the large and my 10 pound Shih Tzu fits comfortably in it. She doesn't tear things up so I'm hoping this will last a while. I was looking for something to keep her safe when driving that I can secure. Hooks to the headrest and seatbelt. I wasn't looking for a carrier so don't know about how it would hold up, but great for the car.
customer_reviews.author: Martha L Garber

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nicely made seat and I would highly recommend it. It's not the seats fault my Papillon puppy thinks I abandoned her in some purple jail.......lol. I have some work cut out for me.😁
customer_reviews.author: Michele Wozniak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our 5lb Pom/Yorkie loves this travel bag, and so do we.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not for active dog.
customer_reviews.text: Went back after first use the only way to keep puppy secure is to attach to their collar but they can Still jump out of the seat. I was scared it would choke him.
customer_reviews.author: Escape

customer_reviews.title: Not a Fan
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made product. The seat belt doesn’t go long enough, the hook isn’t strong enough to keep my dog in if we had an accident. The seat is very small as well... I ordered a medium and my dog is 13lbs and barely fits. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is awesome! Our 17-lb rescue dog got used to it after two short car rides. Hooking the restraint strap to his halter keeps him from getting out, and allows him to still move around a bit. The quality is definitely worth the price, and worth keeping your fur baby safe!
customer_reviews.author: Stace

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy has had a lot of anxiety in the car, especially in a hard carrier. This setup has really helped her calm down and feel more comfortable. She can see me and isn’t so confined- but is still secured with a strap that attaches to her harness. Now we don’t have puppy meltdowns anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the best seat, so good I bought another and replaced a $100 seat with this. It’s so durable and easy to use. I have one for a 5 lb Chihuahua and one for a ten pound Schnoodle. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tina S.

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Sound
customer_reviews.text: First day I was so Thankful I had my puppy protected as a car pulled out right in front of my husband and he had to slam on brakes. I use a harness on my puppy and hook the hook provided to it. I know she is safe.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: She is very good in the car and can travel all day in ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the small for my 9 lb Havanese and she has plenty of room in it to even stretch out in when she wants to lay down. She is very good in the car and can travel all day in it and is very happy to be next to me (although she would rather be on my lap). My only complaints are that the security strap and hook are not very strong and the seat sits a little lopsided on my car seat and I drive a Lincoln MKT which is a big car, so I am not sure how it would fit in a small car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Carol from Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Doggy safe !!
customer_reviews.text: I love how there’s and latch thst attach to dog collar so he want climb out very nice
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that it also includes a tether inside
customer_reviews.text: My little YorkiePoo loves her new carrier. We have a Suburban and sit the carrier on the console between the driver and passenger seats. She can see out the windshield or duck down into the carrier for a nap. I like the fact that it also includes a tether inside.
customer_reviews.author: Marleebar

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this carrier
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this carrier. However, it has only been a few weeks and my puppy has managed to tear a hole in the side. This was just from him pawing at it. He is not overly destructive and has not spent long periods of time in it either.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: maybe 200 times and it's fine. The one that broke had a manufacturing defect
customer_reviews.text: The restraint strap broke after it was used about 10 times. We have another one that is used everyday, maybe 200 times and it's fine. The one that broke had a manufacturing defect. 1 out of 2 doesn't cut it for this type of product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BROKE AFTER ONE USE.
customer_reviews.text: I received this on yesterday evening. We used it ONCE and one of the straps completely ripped off. My puppy is 11 pounds, it's supposed to be able to hold up to 20 pounds. It's extremely disappointing that it broke after ONE use. My husband seriously just carried my puppy to and from the car. My puppy did stay in and looked comfortable. Can someone reach out to me about exchanging it?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe Enjoyable Ride
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my pug. She enjoys it much more than her travel bag. She can sit and see what’s going on while while leashed I’m so she’s safe.
customer_reviews.author: kim foltz

customer_reviews.title: Best Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this.....So much better for my Frenchton to travel in the car...she sits and some times ever sleeps in it. Tried other travel crates and this one is the best one so far. I like the way it closes up to put away when not is use.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy OLeary

product_meta.title: Pettom Pet Car Booster Seat Carrier Airline Approved for Dog Cat Puppy Small Animal Travel Cage
feature_bullets: Comfortably holds your pets when traveling and the mesh panels keep your pet cool and comfortable.
Inside safety lead prevents the pet jumping out.
Product Dimensions: 16 L x 13.5 W x 12 H inches,Suitable for small dogs, cats, puppies and many other house pets weighing up to 20 lbs.
